InstalledItem.Name: RSI Self Destruct
InstalledItem.Description: RSI Self Destruct

InstalledItem.Name: Maelstrom
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

This military-grade component has been put through the paces by the UEE Navy, so you know the Maelstrom can handle the havoc of battle.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: FullStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Featuring proprietary recoil tech, the FullStop shield generator was built to better absorb attacks from a multitude of damage types.

InstalledItem.Name: Gladiator Ship Armor
InstalledItem.Description: Gladiator Ship Armor

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: Beacon
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Wei-Tek has made other mil-spec component manufacturers sit up and take notice with the introduction of the highly praised Beacon quantum drive.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S4 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 4

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-447 Rhino Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 4

When a ship comes charging at you with a CF-447 Rhino strapped on, it is an experience few pilots will ever forget. This formidable size four laser repeater from Klaus & Werner is well suited for medium-range engagements, but packs a wallop up close.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S4 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 4

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-423 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 2xS3

Behring’s MSD-423 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S3 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.
